meta.description: Language labels for the status report

languageKey.label: Magento System
During the initialization of the Magento system the following issues have been found:
The Magento system is not available.
Magento API
During the configuration check of the Magento API the following issues have been found:
Not Available
Available
Unknown
The Magento connector module is not available.
The Magento connector module is not installed or enabled.
Magento Connector
During the configuration check of the Magento connector module the following issues have been found:
The system folder for the TYPO3 frontend users is not valid.
The default group for the TYPO3 frontend users is not valid.
The database connection settings are not valid.
During the data check of the replicated sources the following issues have been found:
Magento Replication
TYPO3 frontend users with duplicate email addresses exist.
TYPO3 frontend users with duplicate customer links exist.
